name: Nimbus Platform GNIMB
description: We launched project in the Ethereum network on January 27, 2021 immediately after that our smart contracts was audited independently. In order to reduce gas fees for users, on July 15, 2021, the project had been launched in the BSC network also. For integration in both networks, the project team developed a machine for switching from the Ethereum network to the BSC. Itâ€™s called a wrap machine, which is the has already passed the independent audit. The next stages of launches and development are: we are in process of going through the audit of smart contracts for the launch of a loan mechanism, a p2p exchanges. For this purpose, auditors, cross-auditors and pin-testers are involved in the process. 48,789 users a month regularly use our platform. We've also integrated with several well-known DeFi protocols: Uniswap, Pancakeswap.finance
